product.title: Space Ducks: The great escape
product.description: In this cosmic puzzle adventure, help a lost tribe of duck-people in their millennial quest for a stable world!

history.text: Complete challenging Sokoban-like puzzles, by moving the space ducks in the right sequence, in order to reach the power source their ship requires and travel to the next level. But tread lightly, as walking on loose ground will propel into space what ever is standing on the other side. One duck's progress could mean another duck's demise! And even if a duck goes solo (years of living on precarious planets have turned the ducks into a somewhat callous people), remember that their is no escaping gravity and that one false move could bring it's mission to a crashing conclusion.

Space Ducks was launched as part of Cosmos9 Bundle: bundle of 9 puzzle games which were discovered in a mysterious, perhaps alien, video game console found floating outside of the Solar System. More info here: https://www.cosmos9bundle.com/

features.feature: Help a lost tribe of duck-people escape from 18+ puzzle planets
Learn and master original sokoban inspired mechanics
Harness gravity to reshape the planets to your needs
Coordinate the ducks' efforts (or let them die trying)
Enjoy the retro-classical art, dark humor and original music

additional.title: Space Ducks was launched as part of Cosmos9 Bundle
additional.description: CosmOS 9 is a bundle of 9 puzzle games which were discovered in a mysterious, perhaps alien, video game console found floating outside of the Solar System. The games were refined and ported to modern computers by a group of experienced puzzle game developers.
